item.description:
Join us for some games in the lounge area of The Roundabout Diner located on the traffic circle in Portsmouth, NH.

 

They have a few tables out back that they said we could game on. I will bring some card games, and a few smaller board games that will be good.

 

I've asked that we be able to game until 9pm, so if people are up for it we can get a couple smaller games in. Also late additions are welcome, Just let us know what time you are able to show up in the RSVP.

 

If people are interested in grabbing a snack before/during gaming let me know. I would be willing to get dinner before hand at around 5pm.

Take a look a the menu here: http://www.roundaboutdiner.com/menus.cfm

 

Sorry for the last minute addition of a Meetup, but people have expressed interest so I worked it out!

 

As long as we get people the Meetup will happen! If for some reason there is not any interest I will call the Meetup off at NOON on Tuesday the 17th.

 

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back lounge area.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Games at The Roundabout Diner
